description: This file contains unit tests for the OxylabsTools class, testing various methods such as search_google, get_amazon_product, search_amazon_products, scrape_website, and error handling scenarios. It uses pytest and unittest.mock to mock dependencies and responses.

classes.name: TestOxylabsToolsInitialization
classes.description: Contains tests for initializing the OxylabsTools class with various credential scenarios.

classes.name: TestSearchGoogle
classes.description: Contains tests for the search_google method, including success, empty query, and invalid domain cases.

classes.name: TestGetAmazonProduct
classes.description: Contains tests for get_amazon_product method, including success and invalid ASIN.

classes.name: TestSearchAmazonProducts
classes.description: Contains tests for search_amazon_products method, including success and empty query.

classes.name: TestScrapeWebsite
classes.description: Contains tests for scrape_website method, including success, invalid URL, and JavaScript rendering.

classes.name: TestErrorHandling
classes.description: Contains tests for handling exceptions during API calls.

classes.name: TestResponseFormatting
classes.description: Contains tests for response formatting, including parsed content and empty results.
